data.eml:eml: Two new entomopathogenic species of Ophiocordyceps in Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xiao, Yuan-Pin, Hongsanan, Sinang, Hyde, Kevin D., Brooks, Siraprapa, Xie, Ning, Long, Feng-Yao, Wen, Ting-Chi (2019): Two new entomopathogenic species of Ophiocordyceps in Thailand. MycoKeys 47: 53-74, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.47.29898, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.47.29898
